snippet.title: Escape the Charon - Official Trailer | IndieMania Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Escape the Charon is a sci-fi adventure meant to be played in one sitting. An ancient alien artifact has been brought to the space station Charon - soon after, the Charon goes dark. James West must search for clues and solve the mystery to discover what went wrong. Escape the Charon will be available on PC (Steam) in 2025.
